title: Principles of gas filled tubes
creator_credit: Division of Visual Aids and F.E. Brooker
brief_description: Theory of ionisation applied to gas-filled tubes; control of current in circuits employing gas-filled tubes; use of the gas diode as rectifier; action of the grid in a gas triode; and application of the gas triode as a grid controlled rectifier.
